A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie had great visuals and sound. But the plot was loose and sloppy. I didn't care about the casino planet and felt that entire thing could have been skipped. There are numerous other plot holes and I do not know why all of the threads left in Episode 7 was left or just snipped without any kind of attempted conclusion. Is anyone actually writing a coherent plotline between all three movies?  It really didn't feel like it is. And I would really love for Disney to retract or uncanonize this movie and while it is a massive ask for them to produce a new movie to fill its spot.
